TopicTitle: [1.4.3]ALCOR,"Advanced Landing Capsule for Orbital Rendezvous" by ASET (08/02/2017)

Articles.Content:
So are the buttons on the right side of the capsule (the ones that say kill rot etc.) set to do something in the future or am I missing something?

yes. it's a placeholder for support direct input for MJ Smart A.S.S. in the future

Did you improve the capsule hitbox? Cause now I can make the rover I wanted to do for a long time. The only drawback (If I can say) is that the IVA is so nice I'm distracted and my rolltest finished accidentally in the see at 23m/s and I was surprised to see that most of the rover survived... except de capsule anyway This is definitivly my rover command pod too.
Wow, amazing work here! This kind of immersion is what I've been waiting for. I would love to see a CM with a control layout as good as this when you're finished working on ALCOR.

yes. it's a placeholder for support direct input for MJ Smart A.S.S. in the future

Thanks, that will be really cool, also can i make a suggestion? a button at the right of the capsule that would be "circ at AP" (circularise at apoapsis) this could make mechjeb circularise at apoapsis without having to use the menu, just one button

There is LEM replica upcoming, so you sure will get some retro stock like feel from that.

Awesome! Who is making it?

Did you improve the capsule hitbox? Cause now I can make the rover I wanted to do for a long time. The only drawback (If I can say) is that the IVA is so nice I'm distracted and my rolltest finished accidentally in the see at 23m/s and I was surprised to see that most of the rover survived... except de capsule anyway This is definitivly my rover command pod too.

Of course I will try to make the entire set compact and (visually) structurally sound.

Hrm... can you do a custom landing gear to give a wider stance? The stock gear leaves that looking a little top heavy...

I thought of making custom landing legs, but the information about setting up the new landing legs in Unity is lacking.

I do not approve (at least, not since recently) of fully automatic procedures such as these. You have Ã¢â‚¬Å“execute next nodeÃ¢â‚¬Â and that, I believe, is sufficient. In any case, this request is best addressed to Mihara, not me, I do not program them.

Will there be some kind of a manual for the IVA (like pdf with 2-4 pages of expanation which button does what and so on)? Honestly I feel lost every time I use ALCOR

As soon as the cockpit layout is actually finalized, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll do that.

Also Alexustas are you going to release that habitat module

I actually started modding specifically to make those habitat modules, but it turned out to be much more complex than I anticipated. I needed to:

* Learn to make the modules themselves, i.e. the models, the IVAs and props.

* Learn how to do the colony infrastructure. (Energy, life support, communications, lighting)

* Devise a delivery and assembly system (Skycranes, rovers)

All of that required much more KSP modding experience than I had, and ALCOR and prior projects, as well as possibly later projects, are essentially training before the big final mission.
Hmmm... Talk to Frizzank from FASA. He's made two different sets of LG lately.

I do not approve (at least, not since recently) of fully automatic procedures such as these. You have Ã¢â‚¬Å“execute next nodeÃ¢â‚¬Â and that, I believe, is sufficient. In any case, this request is best addressed to Mihara, not me, I do not program them.
